description: Defines a Flutter widget named CategoryChip, which displays a selectable chip with a label and optional tap callback.

classes.name: CategoryChip
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a customizable chip with a label, optional selection state, and tap callback.

methods.name: CategoryChip
methods.description: Constructor for the CategoryChip widget, initializing label, selected, and onTap properties.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the CategoryChip, rendering an InkWell containing a Chip with label and styling.
